text: Emmanuel Sowah Adjei (born 16 January 1998) is a Ghanaian footballer who plays as a right back for K.A.S. Eupen. He made his league debut on 21 August 2016 in the fourth game of the Jupiler Pro League 2016–17 season for Anderlecht against K.A.S.
